title: Drunter und Drüber – Chaos auf dem Friedhof
overview: The cemetery director is crushed by a rotten gravestone. Heli Wondratschek then sees his goal as having finally taken over and restored order at Donnersbach Cemetery. However, the pedantic deputy director hasn't reckoned with the city administration. The top job doesn't go to him, but rather to a superior who knows absolutely nothing about cemeteries: Ursula Fink.
